= OSI Forensics Matrix
:toc:
:toclevels: 2

== OSI Forensic Visibility Matrix

[cols="1,2,2",options="header"]
|===
| OSI Layer | Passive (Listening) | Active (Probing)

| L7 Application
| Capture headers, DNS leaks, TLS SNI hostnames
| Banner grabbing, HTTP status checks, API fuzzing, cipher audits

| L6 Presentation
| Identify encoding types and cleartext patterns
| Protocol downgrade tests (TLS 1.0), encoding vulnerability checks

| L5 Session
| Track session durations, retransmits, keep-alives
| Simulate timeouts, validate token/session hijack resistance

| L4 Transport
| TCP/UDP flows, SYN/ACK/FIN patterns
| Port scans, MTU discovery, half-open limits

| L3 Network
| BGP monitoring, ASN path changes
| Ping/Traceroute/MTR, TTL OS fingerprinting

| L2 Data Link
| MAC OUI lookup, ARP table changes
| ARP scanning for hidden devices

| L1 Physical
| SNR, link speed, cable/SFP telemetry
| Path redundancy tests, electrical/optical error rates
|===

== HUD Widgets

* Hardware Health (L1/L2) — NIC throughput, error rates, SFP telemetry
* Route Map (L3) — GeoIP hop map with anomaly highlighting
* Port Heatmap (L4) — port activity grid
* Header Stream (L7) — User‑Agents and Hostnames ticker
